metadata.title: Digital Asset Products Face $1.94B in Weekly Outflows as Bitcoin, Ethereum Lead Withdrawals
metadata.description: Digital asset investment products faced another challenging week, with $1.94 billion in outflows, extending the current four-week streak to $4.92 billion — the third-largest outflow run since 2018, according to CoinShares report. While the market saw deep selling pressure across major assets, tentative signs of stabilization emerged late in the ...
metadata.keywords: AUM, CoinShares, investment products, Digital asset, outflows
